chinese: V.使弯曲 n. 曲线
这条山路有很多弯道。
english: There are several curves in this mountain road

chinese: vt. 环绕•…的轨道运行 n. 轨道
太阳系内的所有行星都环绕太阳运行。
english: All planets in our solar system orbit the sun

chinese: adj，强烈的，激烈的；紧张的；认真的；热情的
人们正在健身房里进行着紧张的训练。
english: People are having an intense training in the gym

chinese: n.敏感；灵敏性
她很在意别人对于她外貌的评价。
english: She showed great sensitivity about what others thought about her appearance

chinese: n.程度；长度
这场地震的破坏程度太大了。
english: The extent of the damage from the earthquake is massive

chinese: 几.消耗，消费
每个月的用电都会花费我很多钱！
english: My monthly electricity consumption costs me a lot

chinese: ad任性的；放纵的；宽容的
我是个很纵容孩子的家长，所以我允许我儿子每天都吃比萨。
english: I'm a very indulgent parent, so I let my son eat pizza every day

chinese: n，部分；片段；（橘子等的）瓣
我们公司占有一小部分市场。
english: Our company dominates a small segment of the market

chinese: n.癌症；（迅速蔓延的）恶劣的或危险的事物
吸烟可能会导致肺癌。
adj. 财政的
这个饼状图展示了2009年的教育、军事和医疗财政支出情况。
english: The pie chart shows the educational, military and medical fiscal expenditure in 2009

chinese: v.相关，有联系；讲述
医生说我肺部的问题和我吸烟的习惯有关。
english: The doctor said my lung problems relate to my smoking habit

chinese: n.绝缘；隔离
电工在工作时戴着绝缘的橡胶手套。
english: The electrician wears rubber gloves for insulation while working

chinese: n. 药
医生给了他一些药来治病。
english: He was given medicine from the doctor to help him cure his disease

chinese: n.偏爱；喜爱物
比起糖果，我更喜欢水果。
english: I have a preference for fruits over sweets

chinese: adj.极美妙的，令人印象深刻的
这栋房子可以看到极美妙的日落。
english: This house has a stunning view of the sunset

chinese: n. 青春期，青春
男孩子通常在青春期开始长胡子。
english: Boys usually start to grow beards in their adolescence
